title: Scandia-doped zirconia for the electrochemical detection of hazardous dihydroxybenzene (DHB) isomers in water

Modified yttria- and scandia-doped zirconium oxide were exploited for the development of an effective electrochemical sensor for the simultaneous detection of dihydroxy benzene (DHB) isomers in water.
